snippet.title: Hero Core trailer - Remar Games
snippet.description:
The official trailer for Hero Core by Remar Games. The game's homepage is www.remar.se/daniel

Watch in 480p!

This was easier than the Iji trailer, and only took a day to make. Cut and synced using VirtualDub.  Note that the HUD surrounding the game screen is not visible in this trailer to keep it from distracting the viewer.

The songs used are "Tetron" and "Zone4" from the Hero Core soundtrack by Brother Android.
